Prompt Template Metadata Extraction
Prompt template contains multiple sections for metadata generation and task specification
Prompt template includes sections for:
Persona scenario generation
QA retrieval
Fact-checking retrieval
Metadata generation for:
Interactivity sensory processing challenges
Modality mismatch challenges
Latest information retrieval using external services
Tasks with insufficient or incorrect user input
Each section provides specific instructions for generating content
Sections focus on generating structured, task-specific metadata
Template appears to be designed for testing and exploring language model capabilities across different scenarios and interaction modes
